fields.name: AssessmentDate
fields.description: The time the evidence was assessed

fields.name: Comments
fields.description: Comments describing why this attestation was created.

fields.name: ComplianceState
fields.description: The compliance state that should be set on the resource.

fields.name: Evidence
fields.description: The evidence supporting the compliance state set in this attestation.

fields.name: ExpiresOn
fields.description: The time the compliance state should expire.

fields.name: LastComplianceStateChangeAt
fields.description: The time the compliance state was last changed in this attestation.

fields.name: Owner
fields.description: The person responsible for setting the state of the resource. This value is typically an Azure Active Directory object ID.

fields.name: PolicyAssignmentId
fields.description: The resource ID of the policy assignment that the attestation is setting the state for.

fields.name: PolicyDefinitionReferenceId
fields.description: The policy definition reference ID from a policy set definition that the attestation is setting the state for. If the policy assignment assigns a policy set definition the attestation can choose a definition within the set definition with this property or omit this and set the state for the entire set definition.
